name: The Ancient African Artifacts Game.
description:
Locate the Ancient African Artifacts(Artefacts?), 

Sort of a cross between Battle Ships, Minesweeper, & Hunt the Wampus! 

Each square represents a dig site, you will either, recover an antique from your history, or you'll find out just how close the nearest buried piece lays.

Saw the game jam a bit late, knocked this together in a few hours over a couple of days.  As far as being a Black History Game, its a bit of a stretch. But don't worry, I'll come better next year!
